Key character in the crossed destinies of Naruto and Sasuke. The Copy Ninja is depictedhere as he appeared during their first encounter, the bell test.

Eyes in Resin

The eyes of various characters from the BIJUtsu® range are made from transparent resin, giving an exceptional depth to their gaze.

Paint Style

In our Crossed Destinies, we’ve added a subtle “cell-shading” effect, visible from a specific angle of the statue. This allows to provide depth and a certain dynamism to the statue.

Base

Depending on the destiny of Naruto or Sasuke, the base varies, telling the story of each protagonist.

Display Set

The BIJUtsu® Display Set transforms your box into an elegant display stand. The ‘Cover’ enhances your statue, and the ‘Scroll’ decorates the background, adding charm to your space.

W : 29 CM x D : 29 CM x H : 51 CM

products.name: Naruto Vinyl Soundtrack Best Collection Edition Standard 1x
products.description:
Naruto Vinyl Soundtrack. Official product by Microids Records.

In the village of Konoha lives Naruto, a young boy who is hated and feared by the villagers because he holds within himself Kyuubi (nine-tailed fox demon) of incredible strength, which killed a large number of people. Konoha's most powerful ninja at the time, the Fourth Hokage, Minato Namikaze, manages to seal this demon in Naruto's body.

Unfortunately he lost his life there.

This is how twelve years later, Naruto dreams of becoming Konoha's greatest Hokage so that everyone recognizes him for his true worth. But the road to becoming Hokage is very long and Naruto will face a lot of hardships and will have to face many enemies to achieve his goal!

Several groups worked on the composition of this vinyl, such as:

Asian Kung-Fu Generation, Little By Litte, FLOW, Sambomaster, Stance Punks, Akeboshi, ORANGE RANGE, Raico, Captain Straydum and No Regret Life.

products.name: Naruto Statue 1/6 Team 7 Naruto, Kakashi, Sasuke, Sakura 45cm
products.description:
Naruto Statue of Team 7 Naruto, Kakashi, Sasuke, Sakura, 1/6 scale size approx.45cm. Official product in limited edition of 200 pieces by Cartoon Kingdom.

"With practice, even a failure can become a genius ... "   Rock Lee

A dunce of an orphan and a great prankster, Naruto will do anything stupid to get noticed.

His dream: to become the best Hokage so that he can be recognised by the inhabitants of his village. In fact, the nine-tailed fox demon sealed inside him has aroused the fear and contempt of the other villagers, who, over time, no longer distinguish between Kyûbi and Naruto.

Despite this, Naruto trains hard to become a genin, the highest level of ninja. After failing the genin exam 3 times, he finally managed to receive his headband from Konoha.

He is then included in a team of three ninja apprentices, along with Sakura Haruno and the talented Sasuke Uchiwa, who wants to avenge the people dear to him, by killing his brother Itachi Uchiwa. Soon after, they meet their jōnin (higher class ninja), the one who will be in charge of their training: the mysterious Kakashi Hatake.

This sublime statue represents Team 7 in its entirety.

Inspired by the cover of Volume 5, the ninja spirit of the book is fully reflected in this statue, which is sure to find a place in any collection.

We really wanted to capture the essence of Naruto in this unique opportunity we had to work on this great licence, and it was important for us to have a complete team.

A team that we wanted to be as close-knit as in the early days of the manga, and that went against everything else on the market.

Dimensions: H45xW35xD26cm

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Statue Murale Naruto & Kurama
products.description:
Naruto Shippuden Wall Statue of Naruto & Kurama. Official product in limited edition of 1000 pieces by Espada Art.

Looking to fight alongside his rival (Sasuke Uchiha), Naruto rushes forward into his battle against Madara Uchiha as he recently obtains his new form, Six Paths Sage Mode. Naruto’s willingness to end the 4th Great Ninja War and determination to protect his fellow shinobi can be seen in his facial expression and powerful pose with newly developed jutsu, Sage Art: Magnet Release Rasengan. For the base, we wanted to pay homage to Naruto’s long term combat partner and new friend, Kurama.

This wall statue is created in 1/8th scale. Naruto is made of high-grade PVC in order to retain precise detail and ensure the longevity of the figure. Kurama is crafted in hand painted transparent resin in order to best represent the immense flow of chakra that he possesses. First run will be limited to 1,000 units

Minato is the creator of the Rasengan technique, intended to protect Kushina and effectively fight a Jinchūriki. His power proved able to block Kurama's Tailed Beast Orb. Here we see him determined and ready to launch his devastating attack.

- HOKAGE -

Fourth Hokage, Minato sacrificed himself for his village. He is represented here with his famous white cape and red flame patterns, with the kanji 四代目火影 meaning Fourth Hokage.

- INVOCATION -

Like his master Jiraiya, Minato can summon toads. He was one of the few people to earn the respect and full cooperation of Gamabunta, depicted on the base ready to draw his sword.

products.name: Naruto The Legend of Naruto Uzumaki MUB My Ultimate Bust 87cm by Tsume
products.description:
Naruto bust of Naruto Uzumaki in MUB range, 1/1 scale size approx.87cm. Official product in limited edition by Tsume Art.

This bust offers not one but three versions of Naruto: from the child, wanting to prove his worth, to the Hokage having achieved his goal, via the teenager, hero of the village of Konoha... We are proud to present the Legend of Naruto Uzumaki.

As a tribute to the Naruto licence in its entirety, the bust is packed with detail. You'll find the leaf with the hole in it, symbolising the name of the village. There are also references to Kyubi from the different versions of Naruto. Particular attention has also been paid to the scenery, whether it's the village or the Hokage mountain. Finally, the symbol on the base varies according to the side of the statue: the Uzumaki family symbol in the child and teenage versions of Naruto, and the Hokage symbol in the adult version.

Naruto's values, characteristic of the Shonen spirit we hold so dear, were one of the driving forces behind Tsume's creation 13 years ago. It all started with Gaara HQS, the foundation stone of a story that seemed unimaginable...

So we couldn't do things by halves for the MUB dedicated to Naruto Uzumaki. It had to be exceptional in order to pay tribute to this iconic character with whom so many people at Tsume can identify.

That's why this bust features not one, but three versions of Naruto: from the child who wanted to prove his worth, to the Hokage who has achieved his goal, to the teenager who is the hero of the village of Konoha... We are proud to present the Legend of Naruto Uzumaki.

This product is not a toy or product for children. It is a collectors item intended for adults only.

products.name: Naruto Shippuden Statue 1/8 Kisame Hoshigaki HQS by Tsume 46cm
products.description:
Naruto Shippuden statue of Kisame Hoshigaki in HQS range, 1/8 scale size approx.46cm. Official product in limited edition of 1200 pieces by Tsume.

"-It’s a special single war attack (…) - Guy

-Super Shark Bomb Jutsu! - Kisame

-Hirudora!"

This 1/8 statue, intended to take place in front of Gaï Maïto - HQS, is an interpretation of the ultimate fight between the Master of Taijutsu, Might Guy, and the Suiton Expert, Kisame Hoshigaki, in the episode “Battle in Paradise! The Odd Beast vs. The Monster!“ from Naruto Shippuden. After the Monster of the Hidden Mist, infiltrating the island to locate Naruto and Killer B, emerges from the Waterfall of Truth with valuable information about the ninja alliance, he absorbs Killer B and Aoba's Chakra and escapes, pursued by the Sublime Green Beast of Prey of Konoha! This is the third time their forces clash, it will be the last! Determined to deliver his report at all costs, the Fish-Man hides it in the mouse of a shark and creates a thousand more to breach Guy's Chakra wall, two sharks attacking here at his side, ready to tear him apart.

Unable to destroy all of these predators, the Power of Youth’s Defender opens the Seventh Gate of Wonder and unleashes his secret weapon and most powerful attack: the Daytime Tiger! Endowed with superhuman strength according to Might Guy, the Cannibal retaliates with a special technique devouring the Chakra of his opponent. We thus see the Akatsuki Shark similar to the ocean’s most frightening predator, with his gills, shark skin, hair in fins, rows of sharp teeth and petrifying gaze of a cold-blooded killer, creating a gigantic Super Shark Bomb Jutsu in bluish transparent resin echoing the depths of the ocean! With outstretched hands, the ruthless Kisame hurls his hungry prehistoric monster with innumerable sharp teeth at his prey to make short work of it, this Suiton technique being a more powerful version of the Water Shark Bomb Jutsu. As he explains to his enemy “The Super Shark Bomb Jutsu attack is not a trivial technique. It absorbs all the Chakra it encounters and gains intensity, depending on the power of its opponent's ninjutsu.“ and he will demonstrate it to him.

As if to attract the feline's attention, a light springs from the shark bowels rising from the abyss of the ocean, crossing the watery Megalodon with its luminous reflection. The shock of the confrontation between the ferocious feline and the bloodthirsty shark unleashes the forces of the ocean, creating a setting of water and foam in transparent resin with different bluish hues around the Shark-Man and his ilk! Mastering all the power of his element, Itachi Uchiha's former partner will stop at nothing to succeed in his mission, whatever its end. On a watery blue edging, Kisame's name appears alongside the crossed-out acronym of the Kiri village which he has deserted. This final message to send reminds us that this solitary predator chooses his own trajectory, and having little fear of troubled waters, will decide for himself the end of his story!

L : 44 CM D: 47 CM H: 46 CM

Limited to 1200 Pieces

This product is not a toy or product for children. It is a collectors item intended for adults only.
